Shmuel "Samy" Flatto-Sharon (18 January 1930 – 7 December 2018) was an Israeli businessman, radio talk-show host and politician. He was born in Łódź, Poland, and fled to France after the beginning of the war. In 1972-he moved to Israel. He was a member of the Knesset between 1977 and 1981. Flatto-Sharon was a member of the Development and Peace Party.
Flatto-Sharon died in Ramat Gan, Israel from a heart attack, aged 88.
